citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12 pm on
04-Sep-19.
I spoke with Mr. Miller at the facility. He is recovering from major surgery and requested the inspection be
postponed.
